#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;
#define gc getchar

void scanInt(int& x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(; (c < 48 || c > 57); c = gc());
for(; (c > 47 && c < 58); c = gc())
x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + c - 48;
}

int main()
{
    int t,s,num,c,m,q;
    int arr[50001];
    int n,j,i,k,count,carry,x,y[50001],p;
    scanInt(t);
    for(p=1;p<=t;p++)
    {
        num=0;
        scanInt(n); scanInt(s);
        while(s>0)
        {
            y[num]=s%10;
            s/=10;
            num++;
        }
       /* for(i=0;i<num;i++)
            printf("%d ",y[i]);*/
        arr[0]=1;
        count=1;
        carry=0;
        for(i=1; ;++i)
        {c=0;
            for(j=0; j<count ;j++)
            {
                x=arr[j]*n+carry;
                arr[j]=x%10;
                carry=x/10;
            }
            while(carry>0)
            {
                arr[count]=carry%10;
                carry=carry/10;
                count++;
            }
       /* for(q=0;q<count;q++)
            printf("%d ",arr[q]);
        printf("\n");*/
        if(count>=num)

         {
            k=count-1;
            m=num-1;
            while(m>=0)
            {
                if(y[m]==arr[k])
                    c++;
                else break;
                k--;
                m--;
            }
            if(c==num)
            {
                printf("Case %d: %d\n",p,i);
                    break;
            }
        }
        if(c==num)
            break;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
